hero.badge: Computer Engineering @ NTU | Backend/Full-Stack Projects | Quant Finance Learner
hero.title: Hi, I'm Jared
hero.subtitle: Computer Engineering @ NTU • Singapore
hero.description: I build production-style web apps and backend services—clean APIs, databases, job queues, and automation—and I enjoy quantitative problem-solving (probability, statistics, and optimization). I’m currently applying for SWE internships and quant finance internships.

about.title: About Me
storyParagraphs: I'm pursuing a B.Eng. in Computer Engineering at Nanyang Technological University (NTU) (First Class Honours).
I like building reliable systems end-to-end—from backend services and databases to accessible UI—and I’m especially interested in roles where software meets data and markets.
workParagraphs: Software Engineering: backend and full-stack development with strong emphasis on code quality, validation, testing, and maintainability.
Quant/Finance: quantitative analysis of market data, financial modeling, and building tools that automate data collection, monitoring, and evaluation.

items.title: Software Engineering Internship
bullets: Backend / full-stack: APIs, databases, caching, async jobs, automation
Comfortable across TypeScript/Node, SQL/Postgres, and modern React/Next.js
Strong focus on readability, testing, and performance basics

items.title: Quant Finance Internship
bullets: Quant trading / research: data-driven experimentation and rigorous evaluation
Interested in time-series, optimization, and simulation/backtesting
Strong Python + solid low-level fundamentals (C/C++)

items.title: Automation & Data
bullets: RPA automation delivering 300+ hours/year time savings
Dashboarding and reporting using SQL + Tableau + Excel/Power Query

items.title: Systems & Cloud
bullets: Hands-on with AWS, Google Cloud, and Alibaba Cloud for deploying personal projects
Comfortable with provisioning, monitoring, and performance/ROI evaluation

items.title: Markets Interest
bullets: Quantitative analysis of market data and financial modeling
Built personal tools for real-time cryptocurrency tracking (interest-led)

projects.title: Projects
projects.intro: Here are some of my recent projects that showcase my skills and experience.

items.title: NTU Mods By Bob
items.description: A course planning and module management tool for NTU students, helping them organize their academic schedules and explore module options.

items.title: NTU Vacancy Alert
items.description: An automated notification system that alerts students when course vacancies open up at NTU, helping them secure spots in their desired classes.

items.title: NTU Public APIs
items.description: A collection of public APIs for accessing NTU-related data and services, making it easier for developers to build applications around university information.

items.title: LostInSg
items.description: A comprehensive carpark finding platform for Singapore that tracks real-time vacancy, parking rates, and available amenities across the island.

items.title: BTO Management System
items.description: A comprehensive management system for Singapore's Build-To-Order (BTO) flats, streamlining the application, tracking, and management process.

items.title: PID Controlled Gyro
items.description: A gyroscope stabilization system using PID control algorithms for precise motion control and balance in robotic applications.

bullets: Provided end-user IT support and handled technical requests, improving response time and user satisfaction.
Built SQL queries and Tableau dashboards to extract, clean, and visualize customer data for decision-making.
Supported infrastructure upgrades and cybersecurity patching across office systems.
Coordinated bilingual communication with headquarters in Traditional Chinese for cross-border collaboration.
Implemented an RPA workflow that saved 300+ hours annually.
Produced CAPEX/OPEX financial reports using Power Query and Excel, streamlining recurring reporting.
Created meeting minutes and engineering documentation to improve traceability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve reporting transparency and automation standards.
Supported technical drawing, design calculations, and field inspection for aircraft maintenance engineering.
Converted and managed 200+ 3D part models/drawings as part of a digitization initiative.
Assisted with documentation and regulatory compliance workflows.
